title: I've got a question.
content:
hi, how can I contact the owner of this blog? Give me his e-mail please, I’ve got a question.

Regards  
Dr. Tomash Sanderson  
 [mp3 blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20071103084021/http:/www.goodchoicemusic.com/top400)

author: sanderson

comments.content: Technically, I believe this is a forum not a blog. However, I’ll send notice of your interest to the powers that be.
